languages.text: "Это так... странно. Фигуры теней плотно укутаны в оттенки тьмы, но я вижу за ними неугасаемое алое свечение. Мне кажется... это добрый знак. Не каждый служитель веры несет в себе столько света".

"It is... strange. Their shadowy forms are swathed in darkness, yet a radiant light burns within them like scarlet flame. I think... it is a good sign. It is rare to see anyone filled with such light, even among servants of the faith."
languages.original_text: "Это так... странно. Фигуры теней плотно укутаны в оттенки тьмы, но я вижу за ними неугасаемое алое свечение. Мне кажется... это добрый знак. Не каждый служитель веры несет в себе столько света".

traits.locale_text: "This is so... strange. The shadows' shapes are wrapped tightly in shades of darkness, but behind them, I see an inextinguishable scarlet radiance. I think... it is a good sign. Even within a servant of the faith, this much light is rarely to be found."

"This is so... strange. The shadows' shapes are wrapped tightly in shades of darkness, but behind them, I see an inextinguishable scarlet radiance. I think... it is a good sign. Even within a servant of the faith, this much light is rarely to be found."

languages.text: « C'est... étrange. Leurs formes sont nimbées de ténèbres, et pourtant, il émane d'eux une lumière étincelante semblable à une flamme écarlate. Je pense... que c'est bon signe. Rares sont ceux qui exsudent une telle radiance, même parmi les plus ardents serviteurs de la foi. »
languages.original_text: "It is... strange. Their shadowy forms are swathed in darkness, yet a radiant light burns within them like scarlet flame. I think... it is a good sign. It is rare to see anyone filled with such light, even among servants of the faith."

traits.locale_text: « C'est... étrange. Leurs formes sont nimbées de ténèbres, et pourtant, il émane d'eux une lumière étincelante semblable à une flamme écarlate. Je pense... que c'est bon signe. Rares sont ceux qui exsudent une telle radiance, même parmi les plus ardents serviteurs de la foi. »

languages.text: «Es... extraño. Sus formas umbrías están envueltas en la oscuridad, pero una luz radiante arde en su interior como una llama escarlata. Creo... que es una buena señal. Es raro ver a alguien lleno de esa luz, incluso entre los sirvientes de la fe».
languages.original_text: "It is... strange. Their shadowy forms are swathed in darkness, yet a radiant light burns within them like scarlet flame. I think... it is a good sign. It is rare to see anyone filled with such light, even among servants of the faith."

traits.locale_text: «Es... extraño. Sus formas umbrías están envueltas en la oscuridad, pero una luz radiante arde en su interior como una llama escarlata. Creo... que es una buena señal. Es raro ver a alguien lleno de esa luz, incluso entre los sirvientes de la fe».

languages.text: “这真的……很奇怪，他们的影子笼罩在黑暗之中，但他们的心灵却熠熠生辉，仿佛猩红的火焰。我觉得……这应该是个好兆头。哪怕是在神皇的信徒之中，也很少能看到如此明亮的光芒。”
languages.original_text: "It is... strange. Their shadowy forms are swathed in darkness, yet a radiant light burns within them like scarlet flame. I think... it is a good sign. It is rare to see anyone filled with such light, even among servants of the faith."

traits.locale_text: “这真的……很奇怪，他们的影子笼罩在黑暗之中，但他们的心灵却熠熠生辉，仿佛猩红的火焰。我觉得……这应该是个好兆头。哪怕是在神皇的信徒之中，也很少能看到如此明亮的光芒。”

languages.text: 「これは…おかしいです。彼らの影のような形は闇に包まれていますが、その内側では緋色の炎のように輝く光が燃えている。私は…これは良い兆候だと思います。このような光に満たされた者は、信仰のしもべであってもめったにお目にかかれない」
languages.original_text: "It is... strange. Their shadowy forms are swathed in darkness, yet a radiant light burns within them like scarlet flame. I think... it is a good sign. It is rare to see anyone filled with such light, even among servants of the faith."

traits.locale_text: 「これは…おかしいです。彼らの影のような形は闇に包まれていますが、その内側では緋色の炎のように輝く光が燃えている。私は…これは良い兆候だと思います。このような光に満たされた者は、信仰のしもべであってもめったにお目にかかれない」

languages.text: "Es ist ... merkwürdig. Ihre schattigen Gestalten sind in Dunkelheit gehüllt, doch ein strahlendes Licht brennt in ihnen wie eine rote Flamme. Ich glaube ... das ist ein gutes Zeichen. Es kommt nur selten vor, dass jemand von einem solchen Licht erfüllt ist, selbst unter Dienern des Glaubens."
languages.original_text: "It is... strange. Their shadowy forms are swathed in darkness, yet a radiant light burns within them like scarlet flame. I think... it is a good sign. It is rare to see anyone filled with such light, even among servants of the faith."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist ... merkwürdig. Ihre schattigen Gestalten sind in Dunkelheit gehüllt, doch ein strahlendes Licht brennt in ihnen wie eine rote Flamme. Ich glaube ... das ist ein gutes Zeichen. Es kommt nur selten vor, dass jemand von einem solchen Licht erfüllt ist, selbst unter Dienern des Glaubens."

languages.text: "Bu biraz... Tuhaf. Müphem biçimleri, karanlıkla sarılıp sarmalanmış. Yine de içlerinde kan kızılı bir alevi andıran, göz alıcı bir ışık var. Sanırım bu... İyiye işaret. Böylesine ışıkla dolu birini görmek, inancın hizmetkârları arasında bile nadiren yaşanan bir durumdur."
languages.original_text: "It is... strange. Their shadowy forms are swathed in darkness, yet a radiant light burns within them like scarlet flame. I think... it is a good sign. It is rare to see anyone filled with such light, even among servants of the faith."
